title: Get Qualified Leads in One Click from Apollo to Airtable
author: Not Another Marketer
readme:
## You Don’t Need More Tools. You Just Need the Right Leads.

Why spend $1,000s on lead gen when your perfect leads are already waiting in Apollo? You’ve already filtered the ideal prospects. You know who they are, where they work, and what they do.

Now **imagine turning that list into enriched, ready-to-contact leads—without paying pricey Apollo's recurring subscription** _(spoiler: you will pay only 0.60$ per 500 leads)_.

## From Filter to Outreach-Ready in Seconds

With the Lead Generation System, you just drop your Apollo search URL.

**The workflow does the rest:**  
✅ Scrapes all matching contacts from your Apollo filter  
✅ Enriches and organizes the data (names, roles, emails, LinkedIns, companies, etc.)  
✅ Delivers the final lead list to Airtable—or your CRM of choice

No more manual exports.  
No CSV mess.  
No VA needed.  
Just qualified leads, cleaned and ready to go.

## Perfect For

  * Founders doing DIY outbound
  * Growth marketers scaling cold email
  * Agencies running lead-gen for clients
  * Anyone tired of paying too much for messy, outdated lists



## Setup Guide

I built a step-by-step guide to setup this workflow in 5 to 10 minutes, available here: <https://notanothermarketer.gitbook.io/home/templates/lead-generation>

This template is free. Enjoy!
readme_zh:
## 你不需要更多工具，只需精准线索

当你的理想客户已在Apollo中静候时，为何还要花费数千美元获取线索？你早已筛选出最佳潜在客户——知晓他们的身份、任职公司与职位。

**现在，想象将这份名单转化为完整可用的待联系线索，且无需支付Apollo昂贵的订阅费**（剧透：每500条线索仅需0.6美元）。

## 从筛选到可触达，只需数秒

使用这套线索生成系统，你只需粘贴Apollo搜索链接：

**系统将自动完成后续工作：**  
✅ 从Apollo筛选结果中抓取所有匹配联系人  
✅ 完善并整理数据（姓名、职位、邮箱、领英资料、公司信息等）  
✅ 将最终线索列表导入Airtable或你指定的CRM  

告别手动导出，  
远离混乱的CSV文件，  
无需虚拟助理，  
直接获得清洗完毕的优质线索。

## 最适合  

• 自主开展外拓的创始人  
• 规模化冷邮件的增长营销人员  
• 为客户提供线索挖掘服务的机构  
• 厌倦为杂乱过时名单付费的所有人  

## 设置指南  

我已制作分步教程，5-10分钟即可完成工作流配置：<https://notanothermarketer.gitbook.io/home/templates/lead-generation>  

本模板完全免费，尽情使用！
title_zh: 一键从Apollo获取合格销售线索至Airtable
